attributes.action: listen to your experienced colleagues, Patricia Hewitt and Geoff Hoon, and call a leadership campaign or a general election immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This a a matter for the Labour Party, not for Government. Please address your concerns directly to the Labour Party.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
